title: Support `Settings` (a.k.a. Input JSON Description) in `@nomiclabs/hardhat-vyper`

labels.name: status:ready
labels.description: This issue is ready to be worked on

body:
Just as an add-on note, since `0.3.10` you can specify the `evmVersion` via the `pragma` statement, so this can be used as a workaround for now as long as you use the latest Vyper version. You can see the configuration details in my [üêç snekmate v0.0.3 release](https://github.com/pcaversaccio/snekmate/releases/tag/v0.0.3):
